formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Community & Path to Sobriety Updates

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me a brief summary of:

• Our community’s current situation (any recent developments, needs, or notable successes).  
• Path to Sobriety’s recent activities (events, programs, outcomes, or metrics you think would be helpful).

Feel free to pull the details directly from our shared Notion workspace if that’s easiest. A concise overview by the end of the week would let me prepare an accurate update for Hope and Recovery Network.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best regards,  
Tom  
Hope and Recovery Network  
tom@hopeandrecovery.org
